title: Times/Siena Polls Show Democrats Slightly Ahead in Key Senate Races
description: Respondents said they preferred Republicans to control the Senate, but individual matchups showed a different story.
dc:creator: Nate Cohn
media:description: John Fetterman, left, holds a lead in our poll of the Pennsylvania Senate race, although most of the survey was held before his debate with Dr. Mehmet Oz.
